Method Detail

getContainer

public javax.swing.JComponent getContainer()
Description copied from interface: DrawingViewer
Returns a JComponent instance that will be used by the viewer to display drawings . The component is constructed by the DrawingViewer implementation and may be used as any other JComponent.

Implementation detail: note that the component will normally be placed in a JScrollPane and therefore must implement the Scrollable interface.

Specified by:
getContainer in interface DrawingViewer
Returns:
a representing JComponent of the viewer
